description: Naturalized - without human impacts on river flow.
Constant human impacts - present-day (year-2000) dams and water use.
Time-varying human impacts - time-varying historical dam construction and water use.
Natural vegetation reference run.
Fixed year-2005 land use, nitrogen deposition and fertilizer input.
Constant pre-industrial (1860) land use, nitrogen deposition, and fertilizer input.
Varying historical land use, nitrogen deposition and fertilizer input.
Varying land use, water abstraction, nitrogen deposition and fertilizer input according to SSP2 and RCP2.6.
Varying land use, water abstraction, nitrogen deposition and fertilizer input according to SSP2 and RCP6.0.
Varying land use, water abstraction, nitrogen deposition and fertilizer input according to SSP2 and RCP8.5.
Land use, nitrogen deposition and fertilizer input fixed at year 2100 levels according to RCP2.6 in 2100.
Varying society according to SSP1 in terms of population and GDP. (in Health sector)
Varying society according to SSP2 in terms of population and GDP. (in Health sector)
Varying society according to SSP3 in terms of population and GDP. (in Health sector)
Varying society according to SSP4 in terms of population and GDP. (in Health sector)
Varying society according to SSP5 in terms of population and GDP. (in Health sector)
Varying land use and human influences up to 2005; fixed present-day site-specific forest management afterwards.
Varying land use and human influences according to SSP2 and RCP2.6. Future forest managed to maximize bioenergy.
Varying land use and human influences according to SSP2 and RCP2.6. Future forest managed to maximize harvested wood products (HWP).
Varying land use and human influences according to SSP2 and RCP2.6. Future forest managed to maximize multifunctional-adapted forest.
Varying land use and human influences according to SSP2 and RCP6.0. Future forest managed to maximize bioenergy. Managements under rcp60soc are the same as in rcp26soc.
Varying land use and human influences according to SSP2 and RCP6.0. Future forest managed to maximize harvested wood products (HWP). Managements under rcp60soc are the same as in rcp26soc.
Varying land use and human influences according to SSP2 and RCP6.0. Future forest managed to maximize multifunctional-adapted forest. Managements under rcp60soc are the same as in rcp26soc.
Varying land use and human influences according to SSP2 and RCP8.5. Future forest managed to maximize bioenergy. Managements under rcp85soc are the same as in rcp26soc.
Varying land use and human influences according to SSP2 and RCP8.5. Future forest managed to maximize harvested wood products (HWP). Managements under rcp85soc are the same as in rcp26soc.
Varying land use and human influences according to SSP2 and RCP8.5. Future forest managed to maximize multifunctional-adapted forest. Managements under rcp85soc are the same as in rcp26soc.
